articles.title: What you absolutely need to know for every NFL game in Week 6 -- including final score predictions
articles.summary: Here's everything you need to know for Week 6 NFL games. Which teams will win, who are the X factors, and which storylines matter most?

articles.title: The latest buzz: Insiders on Geno Smith, Daniel Jones and extensions on the horizon
articles.summary: Are the Raiders worried about Smith? And which coordinators might get head coaching interest?

articles.title: Shedeur to back up Gabriel against Steelers
articles.summary: Shedeur Sanders will be the backup quarterback to starter Dillon Gabriel on Sunday in the Browns' divisional road game against the Steelers, coach Kevin Stefanski announced Friday.

articles.title: Source: Cowboys' Jones won't appeal $250K fine
articles.summary: Cowboys owner Jerry Jones won't appeal the $250,000 fine he received this week from the NFL for an obscene gesture made during the win against the Jets at MetLife Stadium.

articles.title: Concussion protocol for Giants' Dart under review
articles.summary: The NFL and NFLPA are reviewing the concussion protocol used in the evaluation of New York Giants rookie quarterback Jaxson Dart during Thursday night's game against the Philadelphia Eagles.

articles.title: Bucs WRs Godwin, Evans, RB Irving out vs. 49ers
articles.summary: Buccaneers head coach Todd Bowles said Friday that receivers Chris Godwin Jr. (fibula), Mike Evans (hamstring) and running back Bucky Irving (foot, shoulder) will all miss Sunday's matchup with the 49ers.

articles.title: Panthers' Hubbard out; Dowdle up vs. Cowboys
articles.summary: Panthers running back Rico Dowdle will have an opportunity to go against his former team, the Cowboys, on Sunday after Chuba Hubbard was ruled out.

articles.title: CB Newsome on trade to Jags: 'It feels amazing'
articles.summary: Cornerback Greg Newsome said that 'it feels amazing' to be traded from the 1-4 Browns to the 4-1 Jaguars.

articles.title: Eagles RT Johnson calls for 'less predictable' attack
articles.summary: Eagles right tackle Lane Johnson said the offense needs to work hard to "keep defenses guessing" after Thursday night's 34-17 loss to the Giants.

articles.title: Dart, Giants hope win over Eagles shifts narrative
articles.summary: Jaxson Dart led the Giants to a convincing 34-17 win over the Eagles on Thursday night, a victory that they hope begins to change the perception of the team, which went 3-14 last season.

articles.title: 🏈 32 NFL players who could be two-way threats

articles.title: Watching game tape with Jessie Bates III: How the Falcons' star safety gains an advantage on opponents
articles.summary: Bates is an elite talent in the Falcons' defense, but his real edge on the field might come from two tablets and five years of detailed notes.

articles.title: The AFC North QB landscape is not what it was to start the season: What's going on?
articles.summary: It's a bizarre time in the division with Aaron Rodgers the only starting QB who began 2025 in that capacity for the same team.

articles.title: After improbable comeback, Cam Ward's 'poise' is why Titans are confident about his future
articles.summary: After Ward's performance, defensive tackle Jeffery Simmons told him that's why they started him No. 1.

articles.title: After several missed kicks, the pressure is on Rams kicking unit
articles.summary: This season, Karty has missed five kicks. Four of the kicks by Karty have been blocked, the most for any kicker in the league.

articles.title: Giants turn tables on Eagles with complete home victory
articles.summary: The Giants started fast, fell behind, then dominated the second half to take down their hated division rivals.
